creator: dajasin@gmail.com
dajasin@gmail.com
text: Everything prior to getRow() works ok. I debugged and was able to see that the workbook and sheet were returned ok. Just couldn't get the row. Always returned null.

SXSSFWorkbook is write/append only. It does not support reading

To read a .xlsx file, you need to use the regular XSSFWorkbook (or low level event/SAX processing)
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
